page.title: 03A Weekend in Bitteswell
page.content: On Friday nights people watch T.V. or play with their friends.The least popular thing is visiting people. People go to bed later than usual. On Saturday mornings people lie in. The most popular things are watching T.V. and playing with friends.The least popular are shopping and swimming. In the afternoons people watch T.V. and go to bed late.Only a few people play tennis,watch football and go showjumping.Some people play outside with their friends.People do farm work and watch videos. On Sunday mornings people lie in.Most people go to church.Alot of people play with their friends. After lunch most people watch T.V. or take their pets a walk.Some people play with their friends.People go to bed at the usual time.
